short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display filenames for images uploaded to Google Maps by users (in location photos, reviews, etc)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Useful for open source research, this extension extracts the filename of user images uploaded to Google Maps (attached to map locations and reviews) and displays them to you with a simple overlay. These filenames can often provide further clues as to the time and date an image was taken.
